Scenario: Community celebrates successful transition as demonstration model
    Given neighborhood watched Rosa's difficult decision and graceful transition
    And other small business owners face similar ownership burden challenges
    When transition proves successful for all stakeholders
    Then community honors Rosa at public celebration of democratic conversion
    And her story becomes model encouraging other small business owners to consider conversion
    And neighborhood gains confidence in democratic ownership as viable alternative
    And successful transition demonstrates community can support democratic economy
    And community_elohim shares transition story to inspire broader movement
